import re

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    pattern = ''
    text = re.sub(pattern, '', text)
    return text

import re

def remove_vowels_digits_punctuation_whitespace(text):
    pattern = '[aeiouAEIOU0-9\\s\\W]'
    text = re.sub(pattern, 'MUTATED', text)
    return text
